cluster.name: Shade Configuration
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring a shade.

cluster.name: Thermostat
cluster.description: An interface for configuring and controlling the functionality of a thermostat.

command.name: SetpointRaiseLower
command.description: Command description for SetpointRaiseLower

command.name: SetWeeklySchedule
command.description: Command description for SetWeeklySchedule

command.name: GetWeeklySchedule
command.description: Command description for GetWeeklySchedule

command.name: ClearWeeklySchedule
command.description: The Clear Weekly Schedule command is used to clear the weekly schedule.

command.name: GetRelayStatusLog
command.description: The Get Relay Status Log command is used to query the thermostat internal relay status log.

command.name: CurrentWeeklySchedule
command.description: The Current Weekly Schedule Command is sent from the server in response to the Get Weekly Schedule Command.

command.name: RelayStatusLog
command.description: This command is sent from the thermostat cluster server in response to the Get Relay Status Log.

cluster.name: Fan Control
cluster.description: An interface for controlling a fan in a heating/cooling system.

cluster.name: Dehumidification Control
cluster.description: An interface for controlling dehumidification.

cluster.name: Thermostat User Interface Configuration
cluster.description: An interface for configuring the user interface of a thermostat (which may be remote from the thermostat).

cluster.name: Color Control
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for controlling the color properties of a color-capable light.
cluster.attribute: couple color temp to level min-mireds

command.name: MoveToHue
command.description: Move to specified hue.

command.name: MoveHue
command.description: Move hue up or down at specified rate.

command.name: StepHue
command.description: Step hue up or down by specified size at specified rate.

command.name: MoveToSaturation
command.description: Move to specified saturation.

command.name: MoveSaturation
command.description: Move saturation up or down at specified rate.

command.name: StepSaturation
command.description: Step saturation up or down by specified size at specified rate.

command.name: MoveToHueAndSaturation
command.description: Move to hue and saturation.

command.name: MoveToColor
command.description: Move to specified color.

command.name: MoveColor
command.description: Moves the color.

command.name: StepColor
command.description: Steps the lighting to a specific color.

command.name: MoveToColorTemperature
command.description: Move to a specific color temperature.

cluster.name: Ballast Configuration
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring a lighting ballast.

cluster.name: Illuminance Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the measurement of illuminance, and reporting illuminance measurements.

cluster.name: Illuminance Level Sensing
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the sensing of illuminance levels, and reporting whether illuminance is above, below, or on target.

cluster.name: Pressure Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the measurement of pressure, and reporting pressure measurements.

cluster.name: Occupancy Sensing
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring occupancy sensing, and reporting occupancy status.
cluster.attribute: physical contact occupied to unoccupied delay
physical contact unoccupied to occupied delay
physical contact unoccupied to occupied threshold

cluster.name: Carbon Monoxide Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the measurement of carbon monoxide concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Carbon Dioxide Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the carbon diaoxide concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Ethylene Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Ethylene concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Ethylene Oxide Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Ethylene Oxide concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Hydrogen Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Hydrogen concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Hydrogen Sulphide Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Hydrogen Sulphide concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Nitric Oxide Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Nitric Oxide concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Nitrogen Dioxide Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Nitrogen Dioxide concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Oxygen Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Oxygen concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Ozone Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Ozone concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Sulfur Dioxide Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Sulphur Dioxide concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Dissolved Oxygen Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Dissolved Oxygen concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Bromate Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Bromate concentration, and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Chloramines Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Chloramines concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Chlorine Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Chlorine concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Fecal coliform and E. Coli Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Fecal coliform and E. Coli concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Fluoride Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Fluoride concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Haloacetic Acids Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Haloacetic Acids concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Total Trihalomethanes Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Total Trihalomethanes concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Total Coliform Bacteria Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Total Coliform Bacteria concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Turbidity Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Turbidity concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Copper Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Copper concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Lead Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Lead concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Manganese Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Manganese concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Sulfate Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Sulfate concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Bromodichloromethane Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Bromodichloromethane concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Bromoform Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Bromoform concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Chlorodibromomethane Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Chlorodibromomethane concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Chloroform Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Chloroform concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: Sodium Concentration Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring the Sodium concentration and reporting concentration measurements.

cluster.name: IAS Zone
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for IAS security zone devices.
cluster.attribute: Number of Zone Sensitivity Levels Supported

command.name: ZoneEnrollResponse
command.description: Command description for zoneEnrollResponse

command.name: InitiateNormalOperationMode
command.description: Used to tell the IAS Zone server to commence normal operation mode

command.name: InitiateTestMode
command.description: Certain IAS Zone servers may have operational configurations that could be configured OTA or locally on the device. This command enables them to be remotely placed into a test mode so that the user or installer may configure their field of view, sensitivity, and other operational parameters.

command.name: ZoneStatusChangeNotification
command.description: Command description for zoneStatusChangeNotification

command.name: ZoneEnrollRequest
command.description: Command description for zoneEnrollRequest

command.name: InitiateNormalOperationModeResponse
command.description: Confirms that the IAS Zone server has commenced normal operation mode.

command.name: InitiateTestModeResponse
command.description: Confirms that the IAS Zone server has commenced test mode and that the IAS Zone client should treat any Zone Status Change Notification commands received from the sending IAS Zone server as being in response to test events.

cluster.name: IAS ACE
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for IAS Ancillary Control Equipment.

command.name: Arm
command.description: Command description for Arm

command.name: Bypass
command.description: Command description for Bypass

command.name: Emergency
command.description: Command description for Emergency

command.name: Fire
command.description: Command description for Fire

command.name: Panic
command.description: Command description for Panic

command.name: GetZoneIdMap
command.description: Command description for GetZoneIdMap

command.name: GetZoneInformation
command.description: Command description for GetZoneInformation

command.name: GetPanelStatus
command.description: Used by the ACE client to request an update to the status of the ACE server

command.name: GetBypassedZoneList
command.description: Used by the ACE client to retrieve the bypassed zones

command.name: GetZoneStatus
command.description: Used by the ACE client to request an update to the zone status of the ACE server

command.name: ArmResponse
command.description: Command description for ArmResponse

command.name: GetZoneIdMapResponse
command.description: Command description for GetZoneIdMapResponse

command.name: GetZoneInformationResponse
command.description: Command description for GetZoneInformationResponse

command.name: ZoneStatusChanged
command.description: This command updates ACE clients in the system of changes to zone status recorded by the ACE server (e.g., IAS CIE device).

command.name: PanelStatusChanged
command.description: This command updates ACE clients in the system of changes to panel status recorded by the ACE server (e.g., IAS CIE device).

command.name: GetPanelStatusResponse
command.description: Command updates requesting IAS ACE clients in the system of changes to the security panel status recorded by the ACE server.

command.name: SetBypassedZoneList
command.description: Sets the list of bypassed zones on the IAS ACE client

command.name: BypassResponse
command.description: Provides the response of the security panel to the request from the IAS ACE client to bypass zones via a Bypass command.

command.name: GetZoneStatusResponse
command.description: This command updates requesting IAS ACE clients in the system of changes to the IAS Zone server statuses recorded by the ACE server (e.g., IAS CIE device).

cluster.name: IAS WD
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for IAS Warning Devices.

command.name: StartWarning
command.description: Command description for StartWarning

command.name: Squawk
command.description: Command description for Squawk

cluster.name: Door Lock
cluster.description: Provides an interface into a generic way to secure a door.
cluster.attribute: num weekday schedules supported per user
num yearday schedules supported per user
num holiday schedules supported per user

command.name: LockDoor
command.description: Locks the door

command.name: UnlockDoor
command.description: Unlocks the door

command.name: Toggle
command.description: Toggles the door lock from its current state to the opposite state locked or unlocked.

command.name: UnlockWithTimeout
command.description: Unlock the door with a timeout. When the timeout expires, the door will automatically re-lock.

command.name: GetLogRecord
command.description: Retrieve a log record at a specified index.

command.name: SetPin
command.description: Set the PIN for a specified user id.

command.name: GetPin
command.description: Retrieve PIN information for a user with a specific user ID.

command.name: ClearPin
command.description: Clear the PIN for a user with a specific user ID

command.name: ClearAllPins
command.description: Clear all PIN codes on the lock for all users.

command.name: SetUserStatus
command.description: Set the status value for a specified user ID.

command.name: GetUserStatus
command.description: Retrieve the status byte for a specific user.

command.name: SetWeekdaySchedule
command.description: Set the schedule of days during the week that the associated user based on the user ID will have access to the lock and will be able to operate it.

command.name: GetWeekdaySchedule
command.description: Retrieve a weekday schedule for doorlock user activation for a specific schedule id and user id.

command.name: ClearWeekdaySchedule
command.description: Clear a weekday schedule for doorlock user activation for a specific schedule id and user id.

command.name: SetYeardaySchedule
command.description: Set a door lock user id activation schedule according to a specific absolute local start and end time

command.name: GetYeardaySchedule
command.description: Retrieve a yearday schedule for a specific scheduleId and userId

command.name: ClearYeardaySchedule
command.description: Clear a yearday schedule for a specific scheduleId and userId

command.name: SetHolidaySchedule
command.description: Set the holiday schedule for a specific user

command.name: GetHolidaySchedule
command.description: Retrieve a holiday schedule for a specific scheduleId

command.name: ClearHolidaySchedule
command.description: Clear a holiday schedule for a specific scheduleId

command.name: SetUserType
command.description: Set the type value for a user based on user ID.

command.name: GetUserType
command.description: Retrieve the type for a specific user based on the user ID.

command.name: SetRfid
command.description: Set the PIN for a specified user id.

command.name: GetRfid
command.description: Retrieve RFID ID information for a user with a specific user ID.

command.name: ClearRfid
command.description: Clear the RFID ID for a user with a specific user ID

command.name: ClearAllRfids
command.description: Clear all RFID ID codes on the lock for all users.

command.name: LockDoorResponse
command.description: Indicates lock success or failure

command.name: UnlockDoorResponse
command.description: Indicates unlock success or failure

command.name: ToggleResponse
command.description: Response provided to the toggle command, indicates whether the toggle was successful or not.

command.name: UnlockWithTimeoutResponse
command.description: Response provided to unlock with specific timeout. This command indicates whether the unlock command was successful or not.

command.name: GetLogRecordResponse
command.description: Returns the specific log record requested.

command.name: SetPinResponse
command.description: Indicates whether the setting of the PIN was successful or not.

command.name: GetPinResponse
command.description: Returns the PIN requested according to the user ID passed.

command.name: ClearPinResponse
command.description: Returns success or failure depending on whether the PIN was cleared or not.

command.name: ClearAllPinsResponse
command.description: Returns success or failure depending on whether the PINs were cleared or not.

command.name: SetUserStatusResponse
command.description: Returns success or failure depending on whether the user status was set or not.

command.name: GetUserStatusResponse
command.description: Returns the user status.

command.name: SetWeekdayScheduleResponse
command.description: Returns the status of setting the weekday schedule

command.name: GetWeekdayScheduleResponse
command.description: Returns the weekday schedule requested.

command.name: ClearWeekdayScheduleResponse
command.description: Returns the status of clearing the weekday schedule

command.name: SetYeardayScheduleResponse
command.description: Returns success or failure depending on whether the yearday schedule was set or not.

command.name: GetYeardayScheduleResponse
command.description: Returns the yearday schedule requested

command.name: ClearYeardayScheduleResponse
command.description: Returns success or failure depending on whether the yearday schedule was removed or not.

command.name: SetHolidayScheduleResponse
command.description: Returns success or failure depending on whether the holiday schedule was set or not.

command.name: GetHolidayScheduleResponse
command.description: Returns the holiday schedule requested

command.name: ClearHolidayScheduleResponse
command.description: Returns success or failure depending on whether the holiday schedule was removed or not.

command.name: SetUserTypeResponse
command.description: returns success or failure depending on whether the user type was set or not.

command.name: GetUserTypeResponse
command.description: Returns the user type for the user ID requested.

command.name: SetRfidResponse
command.description: Indicates whether the setting of the RFID ID was successful or not.

command.name: GetRfidResponse
command.description: Returns the RFID ID requested according to the user ID passed.

command.name: ClearRfidResponse
command.description: Returns success or failure depending on whether the RFID ID was cleared or not.

command.name: ClearAllRfidsResponse
command.description: Returns success or failure depending on whether the RFID IDs were cleared or not.

command.name: OperationEventNotification
command.description: Indicates that an operation event has taken place. Includes the associated event information.

command.name: ProgrammingEventNotification
command.description: Indicates that a programming event has taken place. Includes the associated programming event information.

cluster.name: Barrier Control
cluster.description: This cluster provides control of a barrier (garage door).

command.name: BarrierControlGoToPercent
command.description: Command to instruct a barrier to go to a percent open state.

command.name: BarrierControlStop
command.description: Command that instructs the barrier to stop moving.

cluster.name: Appliance Control
cluster.description: This cluster provides an interface to remotely control and to program household appliances.

command.name: ExecutionOfACommand
command.description: This basic message is used to remotely control and to program household appliances.

command.name: SignalState
command.description: This basic message is used to retrieve Household Appliances status.

command.name: WriteFunctions
command.description: This basic message is used to set appliance functions, i.e. information regarding the execution of an appliance cycle. Condition parameters such as start time or finish time information could be provided through this command.

command.name: OverloadPauseResume
command.description: This command shall be used to resume the normal behavior of a household appliance being in pause mode after receiving a Overload Pause command.

command.name: OverloadPause
command.description: This command shall be used to pause the household appliance as a consequence of an imminent overload event.

command.name: OverloadWarning
command.description: This basic message is used to send warnings the household appliance as a consequence of a possible overload event, or the notification of the end of the warning state.

command.name: SignalStateResponse
command.description: This command shall be used to return household appliance status, according to Appliance Status Values and Remote Enable Flags Values.

command.name: SignalStateNotification
command.description: This command shall be used to return household appliance status, automatically when appliance status changes.

cluster.name: Power Profile
cluster.description: This cluster provides an interface for transferring power profile information from a device (e.g. Whitegood) to a controller (e.g. the Home Gateway). The Power Profile transferred can be solicited by client side (request command) or can be notified directly from the device (server side).

command.name: PowerProfileRequest
command.description: The PowerProfileRequest Command is generated by a device supporting the client side of the Power Profile cluster in order to request the Power Profile of a server device.

command.name: PowerProfileStateRequest
command.description: The PowerProfileStateRequest Command is generated in order to retrieve the identifiers of current Power Profiles.

command.name: GetPowerProfilePriceResponse
command.description: The GetPowerProfilePriceResponse command allows a device (client) to communicate the cost associated to the selected Power Profile to another device (server) requesting it.

command.name: GetOverallSchedulePriceResponse
command.description: The GetOverallSchedulePriceResponse command allows a device (client) to communicate the overall cost associated to all Power Profiles scheduled to another device (server) requesting it.

command.name: EnergyPhasesScheduleNotification
command.description: The EnergyPhasesScheduleNotification Command is generated by a device supporting the client side of the Power Profile cluster in order to schedule the start of the selected Power Profile and its phases.

command.name: EnergyPhasesScheduleResponse
command.description: This command is generated by the client side of Power Profile cluster as a reply to the EnergyPhasesScheduleRequest command.

command.name: PowerProfileScheduleConstraintsRequest
command.description: The PowerProfileScheduleConstraintsRequest Command is generated by a device supporting the client side of the Power Profile cluster in order to request the constraints -if set- of Power Profile of a client device, in order to set the proper boundaries for the scheduling when calculating the schedules.

command.name: EnergyPhasesScheduleStateRequest
command.description: The EnergyPhasesScheduleStateRequest Command is generated by a device supporting the client side of the Power Profile cluster to check the states of the scheduling of a power profile, which is supported in the device implementing the server side of Power Profile cluster.

command.name: GetPowerProfilePriceExtendedResponse
command.description: The Get Power Profile Price Extended Response command allows a device (client) to communicate the cost associated to all Power Profiles scheduled to another device (server) requesting it according to the specific options contained in the Get Power Profile Price Extended Response.

command.name: PowerProfileNotification
command.description: The PowerProfileNotification Command is generated by a device supporting the server side of the Power Profile cluster in order to send the information of the specific parameters (such as Peak power and others) belonging to each phase.

command.name: PowerProfileResponse
command.description: This command is generated by the server side of Power Profile cluster as a reply to the PowerProfileRequest command.

command.name: PowerProfileStateResponse
command.description: The PowerProfileStateResponse command allows a device (server) to communicate its current Power Profile(s) to another device (client) that previously requested them.

command.name: GetPowerProfilePrice
command.description: The GetPowerProfilePrice Command is generated by the server (e.g. White goods) in order to retrieve the cost associated to a specific Power profile.

command.name: PowerProfilesStateNotification
command.description: The PowerProfileStateNotification Command is generated by the server (e.g. White goods) in order to update the state of the power profile and the current energy phase.

command.name: GetOverallSchedulePrice
command.description: The GetOverallSchedulePrice Command is generated by the server (e.g. White goods) in order to retrieve the overall cost associated to all the Power Profiles scheduled by the scheduler (the device supporting the Power Profile cluster client side) for the next 24 hours.

command.name: EnergyPhasesScheduleRequest
command.description: The EnergyPhasesScheduleRequest Command is generated by the server (e.g. White goods) in order to retrieve from the scheduler (e.g. Home Gateway) the schedule (if available) associated to the specific Power Profile carried in the payload.

command.name: EnergyPhasesScheduleStateResponse
command.description: The EnergyPhasesScheduleStateResponse Command is generated by the server (e.g. White goods) in order to reply to a EnergyPhasesScheduleStateRequest command about the scheduling states that are set in the server side.

command.name: EnergyPhasesScheduleStateNotification
command.description: The EnergyPhasesScheduleStateNotification Command is generated by the server (e.g. White goods) in order to notify (un-solicited command) a client side about the scheduling states that are set in the server side.

command.name: PowerProfileScheduleConstraintsNotification
command.description: The PowerProfileScheduleConstraintsNotification Command is generated by a device supporting the server side of the Power Profile cluster to notify the client side of this cluster about the imposed constraints and let the scheduler (i.e. the entity supporting the Power Profile cluster client side) to set the proper boundaries for the scheduling.

command.name: PowerProfileScheduleConstraintsResponse
command.description: The PowerProfileScheduleConstraintsResponse Command is generated by a device supporting the server side of the Power Profile cluster to reply to a client side of this cluster which sent a PowerProfileScheduleConstraintsRequest.

command.name: GetPowerProfilePriceExtended
command.description: The Get Power Profile Price Extended command is generated by the server (e.g., White Goods) in order to retrieve the cost associated to a specific Power profile considering specific conditions described in the option field (e.g., a specific time).

cluster.name: Poll Control
cluster.description: This cluster provides a mechanism for the management of an end device's MAC Data Poll rate. For the purposes of this cluster, the term "poll" always refers to the sending of a MAC Data Poll from the end device to the end device's parent.

command.name: CheckIn
command.description: The Poll Control Cluster server sends out a Check-in command to the devices to which it is paired based on the server's Check-in Interval attribute.

command.name: CheckInResponse
command.description: The Check-in Response is sent in response to the receipt of a Check-in command.

command.name: FastPollStop
command.description: The Fast Poll Stop command is used to stop the fast poll mode initiated by the Check-in response.

command.name: SetLongPollInterval
command.description: The Set Long Poll Interval command is used to set the read only Long Poll Interval Attribute.

command.name: SetShortPollInterval
command.description: The Set Short Poll Interval command is used to set the read only Short Poll Interval Attribute.

cluster.name: Appliance Identification
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for determining basic information about a device and setting user device information.

cluster.name: Meter Identification
cluster.description: This cluster provides Attributes and commands for determining advanced information about utility metering device.

cluster.name: Appliance Events and Alert
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for transmitting or notifying the occurrence of an event, such as "temperature reached" and of an alert such as alarm, fault or warning.

command.name: GetAlerts
command.description: This basic message is used to retrieve Household Appliance current alerts.

command.name: GetAlertsResponse
command.description: This message is used to return household appliance current alerts.

command.name: AlertsNotification
command.description: This message is used to notify the current modification of warning and/or fault conditions.

command.name: EventsNotification
command.description: This message is used to notify an event occurred during the normal working of the appliance.

cluster.name: Appliance Statistics
cluster.description: This cluster provides a mechanism for the transmitting appliance statistics to a collection unit (gateway). The statistics can be in format of data logs. In case of statistic information that will not fit the single ZigBee payload, the Partition cluster should be used.

command.name: LogNotification
command.description: The Appliance Statistics Cluster server occasionally sends out a Log Notification command to the devices to which it needs to log information related to statistics (e.g., home gateways) which implement the client side of Appliance Statistics Cluster.

command.name: LogResponse
command.description: The Appliance Statistics Cluster server sends out a Log Response command to respond to a Log Request command generated by the client side of the Appliance Statistics cluster.

command.name: LogQueueResponse
command.description: The Log Queue Response command is generated as a response to a LogQueueRequest command in order to notify the client side of the Appliance statistics cluster about the logs stored in the server side (queue) that can be retrieved by the client side of this cluster through a LogRequest command.

command.name: StatisticsAvailable
command.description: The Appliance Statistics Cluster server sends out a Statistic Available command to notify the client side of the Appliance Statistics cluster that there are statistics that can be retrieved by using the Log Request command.

command.name: LogRequest
command.description: The Log request command is sent from a device supporting the client side of the Appliance Statistics cluster (e.g., Home Gateway) to retrieve the log from the device supporting the server side (e.g., appliance).

command.name: LogQueueRequest
command.description: The Log Queue Request command is send from a device supporting the client side of the Appliance Statistics cluster (e.g. Home Gateway) to retrieve the information about the logs inserted in the queue, from the device supporting the server side (e.g. appliance).

cluster.name: Electrical Measurement
cluster.description: Attributes related to the electrical properties of a device. This cluster is used by power outlets and other devices that need to provide instantaneous data as opposed to metrology data which should be retrieved from the metering cluster..
cluster.attribute: average rms voltage measurement period phase b
average rms over voltage counter phase b
average rms under voltage counter phase b
rms extreme over voltage period phase b
rms extreme under voltage period phase b
rms voltage sag period phase b
rms voltage swell period phase b
average rms voltage measurement period phase c
average rms over voltage counter phase c
average rms under voltage counter phase c
rms extreme over voltage period phase c
rms extreme under voltage period phase c
rms voltage sag period phase c
rms voltage swell period phase c

command.name: GetProfileInfoResponseCommand
command.description: A function which returns the power profiling information requested in the GetProfileInfo command. The power profiling information consists of a list of attributes which are profiled along with the period used to profile them.

command.name: GetMeasurementProfileResponseCommand
command.description: A function which returns the electricity measurement profile. The electricity measurement profile includes information regarding the amount of time used to capture data related to the flow of electricity as well as the intervals thes

command.name: GetProfileInfoCommand
command.description: A function which retrieves the power profiling information from the electrical measurement server.

command.name: GetMeasurementProfileCommand
command.description: A function which retrieves an electricity measurement profile from the electricity measurement server for a specific attribute Id requested.
